Message:
before holding out
a stuffed bear she had
made for me.

My mind struggled to keep up,
but I accepted her present.

Then Big Sis pulled me
into her warm embrace.

You’re going to be
kicked out, too...

Tears streamed down my face,
and once they started,
they never stopped.

I held the stuffed bear
close to my chest and
wept in Big Sis’s arms.

After that, the two of us
went into hiding.

Everyday was tough,
but just knowing Big Sis
was waiting for me at home...
was all I needed to be happy.

I guess witches really aren’t
allowed to find happiness.
